snippet: Give families the time and money they need for better eating.
abstract: Op-Ed article by journalist Kristin Wartman recalls long-forgotten proposal under which government would pay parents to stay at home as caretakers for children, with particular focus on providing healthy, home-cooked food; notes that plan was original conceived under aegis of feminism, but that it would also be powerful tool for fighting obesity and decline in civility and morals.
lead_paragraph: Give families the time and money they need for better eating.

headline.main: Pay People to Cook at Home
headline.print_headline: Pay People to Cook at Home
